**User:**
Hi, I'm interested in getting a Verus address, but I'm not sure where to start. Can you walk me through the process and explain the differences between using Verus Mobile and Verus Desktop?

**AI Assistant:**
Getting a Verus address is a great step in exploring the Verus ecosystem. I'd be happy to guide you through the process and explain the differences between Verus Mobile and Verus Desktop.

To get a Verus address, you have two options: using Verus Mobile or Verus Desktop.

**Verus Mobile:**
Verus Mobile is a mobile application that allows you to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) within the application. This means you can easily convert between these two blockchain networks directly from your mobile device. Additionally, Verus Mobile enables MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions, making it a convenient and cost-effective option. You can download Verus Mobile from the App Store or Play Store, depending on your device.

**Verus Desktop:**
Verus Desktop is a desktop application that can be downloaded for Windows, macOS, Linux, or Linux ARM devices. By running a full node in native mode, you can experience all the features of the Verus protocol. This means you have full control over your node and can utilize all the capabilities of the Verus network.

**Key differences:**
The main difference between Verus Mobile and Verus Desktop is the level of control and functionality. Verus Mobile is designed for ease of use and convenience, allowing you to bridge between Ethereum and Verus with minimal setup. Verus Desktop, on the other hand, provides a more advanced experience, giving you full control over your node and access to all protocol features. Ultimately, the choice between Verus Mobile and Verus Desktop depends on your specific needs and preferences.

# Get a Verus address
There are a few ways to get a Verus address on desktop and on mobile.

## Verus Mobile
Download Verus Mobile from the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/en/app/verus-mobile/id6447361908) or [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.autonomoussoftwarefoundation.verusmobile.android&hl=en&gl=US)

Use Verus Mobile to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) all within the application. And use it for MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions: [more on Verus DeFi](/sendcurrency)

## Verus Desktop
Download Verus Desktop for Windows, macOS, Linux or Linux ARM [here](https://verus.io/wallet).

Run a full node (native mode) to experience all protocol features.
